description: A Young Feather by the name of Dai has to return to the Abandoned Factory; Rakka accompanies him there. But neither Midori nor Reki are willing to tell her what happened to separate these two groups of Haibane that once used to be friends. After her work in the temple, Washi tells Rakka that Reki is waiting for her. And when Rakka visits the library to report that Nemu has caught a cold, Sumika shows her an ancient petrified book with strange, unknown symbols... which Rakka has seen before.

titles.title: Abschied / Die Dunkelheit im Herzen / Unentbehrliches
Betsuri - Kokoro no Yami - Kakegae no Nai Mono
Parting / Darkness in the Heart / Irreplaceable Thing
Rozstanie; Mrok w sercu; To co niezastąpione
Séparation - Ténèbres du cœur - Chose irremplaçable
Разлука — Тьма в сердце — То, что ничем не заменишь
別離・心の闇・かけがえのないもの
